comment.body:
> [effekt](#comment_1_1PX7VW6xfccTT2tNUTwrYKJpGsGfrnoJfP): "New York Times and BBC" - can we get telesur, RT, cryptogon and http://neniammilitointerni.over-blog.com/ on there too?

I'll see what I can do about adding other news sources.

I had to disable this due to issues with the process that retrieved the articles hanging occasionally and filling up server memory. I'll revisit it and at that time look at caching them in ZeroNet too.
I'm using a script. It polls the news sites regularly and generates the page in ZeroNet.
